You will be a lead developer responsible for new software features and enhancements to existing features. You should have outstanding communication skills and the ability to "think outside the box" to find new and innovative solutions to unusual problems.
Our team works fully remote. Candidates must be based either in the US or the UK and must have a valid work permit for either country. We do not sponsor work visas.
